body_html:
@apaszke I see your point. Sure that having data source might be useful at some point.
However, I think it would be rather difficult to get some stats for the sampler from data_source directly as it delivers x (e.g. image) and y (e.g. target).
body_text:
@apaszke I see your point. Sure that having data source might be useful at some point.
However, I think it would be rather difficult to get some stats for the sampler from data_source directly as it delivers x (e.g. image) and y (e.g. target).
body:
@apaszke I see your point. Sure that having data source might be useful at some point.
However, I think it would be rather difficult to get some stats for the sampler from `data_source` directly as it delivers x (e.g. image) and y (e.g. target).
